title: DeepSeek LLM Research
description: Researches DeepSeek LLMs for a blog post, covering overview, history, opinions, controversies, and future trends using web search, Wikipedia, website scraping, and map searches.

metadata.title: Research DeepSeek LLMs
metadata.description: Conducts comprehensive research on DeepSeek LLMs using a variety of tools including web search, Wikipedia, webpage retrieval, and map search. Aims to gather an overview, historical context, opinions, controversies, and future developments related to the topic.

parts.text:
Collect raw data on the topic. The data should include:

- The basic overview of the topic
- Historical perspective, if applicable
- Current opinions on the topic, if applicable
- Any controversies that might be surrounding the topic
- Any future developments around the topic

Use {{"type":"tool","path":"./tools.bgl.json#module:search-web","title":"Search Web"}}, {{"type":"tool","path":"./tools.bgl.json#module:search-wikipedia","title":"Search Wikipedia"}}, {{"type":"tool","path":"./tools.bgl.json#module:get-webpage","title":"Get Webpage"}}, and {{"type":"tool","path":"./tools.bgl.json#module:search-maps","title":"Search Maps"}} tools

Topic: DeepSeek LLMs

A space opera set in far future, where humans settled on a distant planet, far from Earth. The planet is a paradise, but it is disputed territory with an alien race. The humans are caught in a constant struggle that dampens their ability to flourish.
